mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplement(num, userId, subject, content, hashtag, register_date, hitCount, imageFilename) VALUES(supplement_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{hashtag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, 0, #{imageFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT s.num, s.userId, userName, subject, TO_CHAR(register_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') register_date, hitCount, imageFilename, NVL(likeCount, 0) likeCount FROM supplement s JOIN member1 m ON s.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT num, COUNT(*) likeCount FROM supplement_like GROUP BY num ) slk ON s.num = slk.num
ORDER BY s.num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM supplement s JOIN member1 m ON s.userId=m.userId
mapper.update: UPDATE supplement SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select: select num, userId, userName, subject, imageFilename, likeCount from ( SELECT s.num, s.userId, userName, subject, TO_CHAR(register_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') register_date, hitCount, imageFilename, NVL(likeCount, 0) likeCount FROM supplement s JOIN member1 m ON s.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT num, COUNT(*) likeCount FROM supplement_like GROUP BY num ) slk ON s.num = slk.num ORDER BY likeCount DESC )WHERE rownum <= 4
